overview: The For Milo script was written in 2019 and won the December 2019 Berlin Flash Film Festival award for Best 1 Page Short Script. The film was shot in a single location in a single day, with only 2 actors, one of whom also served as Director of Photography. For Milo was shot on the Black Magic Pocket 4k. The film also contains no dialogue.
tagline: A short film without any word
title: For Milo
